DocAttribute.Name: HasProperties
DocAttribute.Documentation: Contained set of properties. For property sets defined as part of the IFC Object model, the property objects within a property set are defined as part of the standard. If a property is not contained within the set of predefined properties, its value has not been set at this time.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Name attribute has to be provided. The attribute is used to specify the type of the property set definition. The property set structure for particular property sets may be given within the property set definition part of the IFC specification.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR32
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Every property within the property set shall have a unique name attribute value.
